root.title: Rose App
root.description: Rose App is a beautiful platform dedicated to roses and flowers, helping users explore, choose, and enjoy the elegance of nature.

best-seller.title: best selling
best-seller.heading: check Out what everyone’s buying right Now
best-seller.paragraph: Not sure what to choose? Start with our best sellers, these are the gifts our customers keep coming back for. Whether you're celebrating a birthday, anniversary or wedding, our top picks are guaranteed to leave a lasting impression.

about.title: About
about.header: Delivering the Finest Gift Boxes for Your Special Moments
about.description: Make every moment memorable with our premium gift boxes. Carefully curated and beautifully packaged, each box is filled with handpicked items designed to impress. Whether it's for a birthday, wedding, or a simple “thank you,” our gift boxes are crafted to leave a lasting impression — because thoughtful gifting starts here.

home.occasion_title_1: Celebrate Her Forever with a Gift She’ll Always Remember
home.occasion_title_2: Honor the Beginning of a Beautiful Journey Together
home.occasion_title_3: Mark Every Year of Love with a Meaningful Surprise
home.occasions_slider_desc: Elegant gifts for every special moment..
home.occasion_title: Special Gifts For The People You Love

validations.firstName-min: First name must be at least 2 characters long
validations.firstName-max: First name must be maximum 20 characters
validations.lastName-min: Last name must be at least 2 characters long
validations.lastName-max: Last name must be maximum 20 characters

products.price-to-max: please enter a number less than 10000
products.price-from-max: please enter a number less than 1000
products.price-from-less-than-to: Price 'from' must be less than price 'to'
products.price-to-greater-than-from: Price 'to' must be greater than price 'from'
